nodes.text: A Sullustan male lived during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. He had brown skin and black eyes. The Sullustan was dressed in a short-sleeved, multi-colored, patterned shirt with a circular symbol on the lapel—his lucky shirt. The garment was worn over a dark, long-sleeved undershirt and paired with dark slacks and a black belt.
The character was depicted on the "Lucky Shirt" card for the Threat of the Conqueror expansion card set for the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game, released in 2010.
